value.name: Street portrait of man killed by police vandalized in Salt Lake City
value.description: The picture of Chad Michael Breinholt is one of several portraits located along 300 West on a building south of 800 South. All are of people killed by police. They were painted, starting with ...

value.name: West Valley Police ID man who was fatally shot by an officer
value.description: WEST VALLEY CITY, Utah (AP) — Police in West Valley City have identified a man who was fatally shot by an officer during an arrest. They say 31-year-old Chad Michael Breinholt was under ...
